# Reading the data sets

First dataset is a control meaning that the total RNA was used at the same concentrations as Df2dataset but no reverset transcriptase used.

```{r}

Df1dataset <- read_delim("Data/2020 07 17 onlyRNAcontwtBW rtQpcr.txt", 
    "\t", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE , skip = 10, n_max = 39) 
Df1dataset <- janitor::remove_empty(Df1dataset) 
Df1dataset <- rename(Df1dataset,  TmValue = `Tm Value`)
Df1dataset <- Df1dataset %>% select (-c( NAW, EAF))
Df1dataset <- mutate(Df1dataset, Bacteria = "WT" , TDate = "2020-07-17")
Df1dataset <- mutate(Df1dataset, SamP = `Sample Name` )
Df1dataset <- rename(Df1dataset, Strain = `Sample Name` )
Df1dataset$Ct <- as.numeric(Df1dataset$Ct, digits = 4, is.numeric = TRUE)


```

cDNA synthesis: WT1.2 and WT2.2 were used. Both ISMmix primers and Random Primers were used for the cDNA synthesis. But for the SYBR dye based qPCR reactions WT1.2 with Random primers were used.
```{r}
Df2dataset <- read_delim("Data/2020 07 17 wtBW rtQpcr.txt", 
    "\t", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE , skip = 10, n_max = 78) 
Df2dataset <- janitor::remove_empty(Df2dataset) 
Df2dataset <- rename(Df2dataset,  TmValue = `Tm Value`)
Df2dataset <- Df2dataset %>% select (-c( NAW, EAF, HNS, CAF))
Df2dataset <- mutate(Df2dataset, Bacteria = "WT" , TDate = "2020-07-17")
Df2dataset <- mutate(Df2dataset, SamP = `Sample Name` )
Df2dataset <- rename(Df2dataset, Strain = `Sample Name` )
Df2dataset$Ct <- as.numeric(Df2dataset$Ct, digits = 4, is.numeric = TRUE)
```

Df2dataset contains the table named Df1dataset control only RNA reactions.
As seen from the file name the experiment date is 17.07.2020 and the strain is WT.

the primer couple for line 11 gives 2 dissociation curves.
"H16" should be eliminated from the Df1dataset.
```{r}
Df1dataset <- Df1dataset %>% mutate(Strain = case_when(
Strain == "B4" ~ "CorA", Strain == "C4" ~ "CorA",
Strain == "D4" ~ "CorA", Strain == "B5" ~ "cysG",
Strain == "C5" ~ "cysG", Strain == "D5" ~ "cysG",

Strain == "B6" ~ "frr", Strain == "C6" ~ "frr",
Strain == "D6" ~ "frr", Strain == "B7" ~ "gyrA",
Strain == "C7" ~ "gyrA", Strain == "D7" ~ "gyrA",

Strain == "B8" ~ "hcaT", Strain == "C8" ~ "hcaT",
Strain == "D8" ~ "hcaT", Strain == "B9" ~ "idnT",
Strain == "C9" ~ "idnT", Strain == "D9" ~ "idnT",

Strain == "B10" ~ "Lnt2", Strain == "C10" ~ "Lnt2", 
Strain == "D10" ~ "Lnt2", Strain == "B11" ~ "Lnt",
Strain == "C11" ~ "Lnt", Strain == "D11" ~ "Lnt",

Strain == "B12" ~ "miaB", Strain == "C12" ~ "miaB",
Strain == "D12" ~ "miaB", Strain == "B13" ~ "ybeX",
Strain == "C13" ~ "ybeX", Strain == "D13" ~ "ybeX",

Strain == "B14" ~ "ybeY", Strain == "C14" ~ "ybeY",
Strain == "D14" ~ "ybeY", Strain == "B15" ~ "ybeZ",
Strain == "C15" ~ "ybeZ", Strain == "D15" ~ "ybeZ",

Strain == "B16" ~ "ybeZY", Strain == "C16" ~ "ybeZY",
Strain == "D16" ~ "ybeZY"
))

Df1dataset <- rename(Df1dataset, Gene = Strain )
```


ggplot(data = Df1dataset) +

    mapping = aes(x = Gene, y = Ct),
    fun.min = min,
    fun.max = max,
    fun = mean, geom = "")
